content.text:
# Draft:10th Hum Awards

(talk) 23:59, 18 October 2025 (UTC)}}
----
The 10th Hum Awards by Hum Network Limited, honored the best in fashion, music, and Hum Television Dramas of 2024. It took place on 11 October 2025 at the NRG Arena, Houston, Texas. The ceremony will televised in Pakistan by Hum TV. It was hosted by Hamza Sohail and Dananeer Mobeen.
Nominees & Winners
The nominations were announced on September 1 2025
{|class="wikitable"
| colspan="2" valign="top" width="50%"|
* Ishq Murshid–  Moomal Entertainment & Momina Duraid Productions
** Zard Patton Ka Bunn – Kashf Foundation & Momina Duraid Productions

** Zulm – and Momina Duraid Productions
** Aakhir Kab Tak – Momina Duraid Productions
** Jafaa –Momina Duraid Productions
** Khushboo Main Basay Khat - Momina Duraid Productions
|-
